page.title: 20UFFCULME TODAY
page.content: Uffculme is a pleasant place to live in. There is beautiful countryside all around you and there are lots of pleasant walks to take especially those that go along by the river Culm. You can do most of your shopping in the village if you want to but we do miss not having a chemist or a shoe shop. Most people have cars now and this is almost essential because the bus services are very poor. There are plenty of activities in the village for those who like to join in things and people are very friendly here. The new houses that are being built are attracting new paople and this is helping to make the activities in the village more varied. Most people now work outside the Village with Lloyd Maunders at Willand and E.C.C. in Uffculme being the two biggest local employers.
